entry.content: Has anyone read the book "Woke Racism" by John McWhorter? And is it any good? I saw it at the bookstore in the staff recommendation section the other day (which frankly surprised the hell out of me). Thought about getting it, but I thought I would see if others here had read it before I drop the cash.
